problems.text: A plant grows 2 cm on day 1, 4 cm on day 2, 6 cm on day 3, etc. How tall is it after 10 days?
Ella receives ₱100 allowance in week 1, ₱120 in week 2, and so on. What's her total allowance in 4 weeks?
A man earns $3000 in the first month and receives a $250 raise each month. What is his salary in month 9?
Tim collects 3 stamps the first week and increases by 4 weekly. How many does he collect in 5 weeks?
